::Zardus/Mosquitor::

Zardus rolls as he reaches the ground, several shots hitting him and almost making him mess up and fall, but he regains his balance and jumps to his feet, firing a missile at Aelo. He throws the missile launcher to the side as it runs out of ammo, and fires several shots from his rifle at the femm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Mosquitor transforms back into robot mode after Celeno falls into stasis lock, a good amount of acid still inside her and eating away. He finally notices the energy that she had taken from him, finding it a bit hard to stan in the air. Landing on the doorway, Mosquitor takes out his acid hose (mouthpiece in robot mode), sending a stream of acid at Ocipite and Aelo, splashing alot of it onto the floor.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::
> 
> With the hit Celeno fell in stasis lock; Aelo fell on floor, she 
> lookehow her sister avoided Zaruds's missiles and  she shouted to 
> Ocipite "RUN!!!!"
> 
> "WHAT!!!" answered Ocipite while she fired  ten energy balls against 
> Mosquitor and ten agains Zardus.
> 
> "DOn't ARGUE!!!!" shouted Aelo while she fired ten energy balls a 
> Hurrican and ten more against Wheeljack.
> 
> "WE..." 
> 
> "OCIPITE Is not TIME TO ARGUE that!!" Shouted Aelo
